# Necesarry libraries

```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
```

# Loading dataset

```{r}
dataset <- read_csv("preprocessed_data.csv")
```

```{r}

dataset1 = subset(dataset, BedroomAbvGr != 8)

plot(dataset1$BedroomAbvGr,dataset1$SalePrice)

quartiles = quantile(dataset1$SalePrice, probs = c(.25, .75), na.rm=FALSE)
IQRsalePrice = IQR(dataset1$SalePrice)

lower <- quartiles[1] - 1.5*IQRsalePrice
upper <- quartiles[2] + 1.5*IQRsalePrice

no_outliers = subset(dataset1, dataset1$SalePrice > lower & dataset1$SalePrice < upper)

plot(no_outliers$BedroomAbvGr, no_outliers$SalePrice)

dataset2 <- dataset1[names(dataset1) %in% c('SalePrice', 'BedroomAbvGr')]

no_outliers %>%
  group_by(BedroomAbvGr) %>%
  count() -> dataset3

dataset3

```
```{r}

data1to4 = subset(no_outliers, no_outliers$BedroomAbvGr > 0 & no_outliers$BedroomAbvGr < 5) 

plot(data1to4$SalePrice ~ data1to4$BedroomAbvGr)

boxplot(SalePrice ~ BedroomAbvGr,data=data1to4)
```
```{r}

require(nortest)

bartlett.test(data1to4$SalePrice ~ data1to4$BedroomAbvGr)

lillie.test(data1to4$SalePrice)
lillie.test(data1to4$SalePrice[data1to4$BedroomAbvGr == 1])
lillie.test(data1to4$SalePrice[data1to4$BedroomAbvGr == 2])
lillie.test(data1to4$SalePrice[data1to4$BedroomAbvGr == 3])
lillie.test(data1to4$SalePrice[data1to4$BedroomAbvGr == 4])

aov = aov(data1to4$SalePrice ~ data1to4$BedroomAbvGr)

summary(aov)
```
